Title: Fill Primary ID
Content:
Fill Primary ID 
 '[Arguments]    ${platform}    ${id}    ${guid}=default value    ${cid}=default value    ${instance_id}=default value' 'IF    '${platform}'=='XRS'' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_company_id_input_text}    ${LG_TIME}' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_company_login_input}      ${LG_TIME}' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_company_guid_input}       ${LG_TIME}' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_instance_input_text}      ${LG_TIME}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_company_id_input_text}    ${id}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_company_login_input}      ${cid}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_company_guid_input}       ${guid}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.xrs_instance_input_text}      ${instance_id}' 'ELSE IF    '${platform}'=='Roadnet'' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.rn_buid_input_text}           ${LG_TIME}' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.rn_customer_id_input_text}    ${LG_TIME}' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.rn_instance_id_input_text}    ${LG_TIME}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.rn_buid_input_text}           ${guid}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.rn_customer_id_input_text}    ${cid}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.rn_instance_id_input_text}    ${instance_id}' 'ELSE' 'Wait Until Element Is Visible    ${accounts_page_locators.primary_id_input_text}        ${LG_TIME}' 'Input Text                       ${accounts_page_locators.primary_id_input_text}        ${id}' 'END'

ApplicableTo.Keyword: Fill Primary ID
